item.title: Random Parcelization
item.description: Random Parcelization Considering files DKTatlas40 (atlas) for marco parcelization and ic4 micro parcelization (uniform) we map the brain and we found a number of randomic variance of this parcelization Phase 2 In order to prepare data and parcelyze randomly patient data you need to perform a series of actions using FreeSurfer scripts. Recall to setup SUBJECTS_DIR and FREESURFER_HOME environment variables to work with FreeSurfer. The actions are: merge all labels in a single label per hemisphere create an annotation (label + colortable) from merged labels apply this label + coloratab to each patient to create the original labelling Subjects directory schema .
